links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (20,-160,640,-1280,1024).
mathematica: f[n_]:=n^4*4^n; f[Range[0,40]] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Feb 14 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,22,print((n^4)*(4^n)))(PARI) { for (n=0, 200, write("b062075.txt", n, " ", n^4 * 4^n) ) } [_Harry J. Smith_, Jul 31 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 27 2001
